results.idea: Short-term momentum (5-day zscore of returns)

KEEP_IN_MINDs: short expression, ≤7 ops, 2 datafields. Confidence 0.72 because volume confirmation boosts robustness.

results.description: Require percent change breakout and trendspotter_strength high for confirmation. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_trendspotter_strength used; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: concise. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: MA50 weakness fade (MA50 signal Sell with high short-term percent gain)
results.description: Short when MA50 signals Sell but short-term percent change is strongly positive (fade rallies in downtrend). SUGGESTION1: mcr38_ma_50_signal and mcr38_percent_change used; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: short. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum-seasonality proxy (ts_step combined with returns trend)
results.description: Use ts_regression to detect slope of returns (trend strength). KEEP_IN_MIND2: ts_regression counts as one operator; we pass returns. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_last used; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Percent change momentum filtered by low ts_std_dev (stable momentum)
results.description: Prefer names with strong returns but low recent volatility to reduce risk. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_percent_change and ts_std_dev of returns used (single datafield mcr38_last for volatility); SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: ≤7 ops, 2 underlying fields. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: BB direction + percent_change alignment
results.description: Require BB direction indicating strengthening (direction=5) and positive percent change to capture strong breakouts. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_bb_direction and mcr38_percent_change used; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used high userCount. KEEP_IN_MINDs: short. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: CCI40 momentum filter (cci40_strength zscore)
results.description: Use ts_zscore on cci40_strength to find unusually strong CCI signals. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_cci_40_strength used; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: concise. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: MACD cross-confirmed by MA signals (MACD Buy and MA20 Buy)
results.description: Require MACD and short MA both Buy to strengthen signal. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_macd_20_50_signal and mcr38_ma_20_signal used; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: ≤7 ops. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: High last price zscore with low group exposure (conceptual)
results.description: Prefer high zscore of last price but would normally group-neutralize; KEEP_IN_MIND2 limits GROUP usage, so provide raw zscore. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_last used; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: ADX strength cross-check before entering on percent spike
results.description: Require ADX strength > threshold when percent_change spike to avoid whipsaw. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_adx_strength used; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: concise. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Short-term breakout but low ADX (fade high prob false breakout)
results.description: If percent change strong but ADX weak, avoid or short. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_adx_strength used; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: short. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Volume-weighted ADX momentum (ADX strength * volume quantile)
results.description: Favor ADX-confirmed moves that also have high volume. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_adx_strength and mcr38_volume used; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: ≤7 ops. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Percent change over 1 day vs 5 day (acceleration detection)
results.description: Subtract 5-day return from 1-day return to find accelerating moves. SUGGESTION1: uses ts_returns on mcr38_last; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: short. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Trendspotter strength zscore

results.idea: Short-term percent change * direction_rating (weighted momentum)
results.description: Weight recent move by direction_rating to prefer directional consensus. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_direction_rating used; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: short. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: MA20 strength vs MA100 strength divergence
results.description: Subtract long-term MA100 strength from MA20 strength to detect accelerating short-term trend relative to long-term. results.idea: Percent change ranked and bucketed (top decile longs)
results.description: Bucket percent_change ranks into deciles to create discrete long/short buckets. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_percent_change used with bucket(rank(...)); SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: uses ≤7 ops and 1 datafield. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Short-term directional IR (ts_ir of percent change)
results.description: Compute information ratio of percent change time series to find persistent directional names. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_percent_change used with ts_ir; SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: concise. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: High-low mean reversion (low daily range with sudden up move)

results.idea: Percent change stability (ts_std_dev low and positive returns)
results.description: Favor names with positive returns and low volatility for more stable momentum. SUGGESTION1: mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_last used (for returns stddev); SUGGESTION2: no vector; SUGGESTION3: coverage high; SUGGESTION4: used. KEEP_IN_MINDs: ≤7 ops. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Trendspotter + ADX alignment (both strong Buy)

results.idea: Short-term negative percent_change with rising ADX (confirming downtrend)

results.idea: Short-term volume surge with ADX weak (contrarian)
